examples.text: Maliye Vekâletince teşkil olunan Islahat Maliye Komisiyonu her 15 günde muntazaman toplanarak çalışmaktadır.
examples.translation: The Financial Reform Commission established by the Ministry of Finance meets regularly every 15 days.

etymology: Arabic adverbial accusative of muntazam, from Ottoman Turkish منتظم (muntazam), from Arabic مُنْتَظَم (muntaẓam).
